sentences.en: Before the recent political scandal, her reputation had been stainless.
sentences.cn: 在最近的政治丑闻之前, 她的名声是无懈可击的.

sentences.en: Brass, copper, stainless steel, bismuth, and lead are all suitable.
sentences.cn: 黄铜 、 铜 、 不锈钢 、 铋及铅都是适合的.

sentences.en: He makes decorative vessels in copper, stainless steel and silver.
sentences.cn: 他用铜、不锈钢和银制造装饰性器皿。

sentences.en: I could call her nothing in my own mind save'stainless virgin ".
sentences.cn: 我的心里除了叫她为 “ 白壁无瑕的处女 ” 而外,实在找不出其它的称呼来.

sentences.en: I have a set of stainless knives and forks.
It is a stainless steel tube about 2 cm in diameter.
sentences.cn: 它是直径约2厘米的不锈钢管.

sentences.en: It's possible to weld stainless steel to ordinary steel.
sentences.cn: 不锈钢是有可能和普通钢焊接在一起的。

sentences.en: Primary chalk filters and gypsum repulper are made of AISI 304 stainless steel.
sentences.cn: 一般碳酸钙过滤机和石膏再浆器用AISI3O4号不锈钢制成.

sentences.en: Stainless products are always popular because they're rustproof.
sentences.cn: 不锈钢制品因为能防锈，所以很受欢迎。

sentences.en: The rotor connected the various ports in the stainless - steel valve block.
sentences.cn: 转动件和不锈钢阀块各个孔相连.

sentences.en: The stainless drum may be used to make larger batches.
sentences.cn: 不锈钢转数设备可用来加工批量大的料.

sentences.en: The standard spec includes stainless steel holding tanks.
sentences.cn: 标准配置里包含了不锈钢储液罐。

sentences.en: The workers are casting a stainless steel bust.
sentences.cn: 工人们正在铸造一座不锈钢的胸像.

sentences.en: They've got a battery of stainless cooking utensils in their kitchen.
sentences.cn: 他们在厨房里配备了一套不锈钢的厨房用具.

words.tran_cn: 玷污；败坏；给…染色（stain的过去式和过去分词）
[材]不锈的；纯洁的，未被玷污的；无瑕疵的

phrases.tran_cn: 奥氏体不锈钢；沃斯田不锈钢
双相不锈钢；二联不锈钢
铁素体不锈钢；肥粒铁不锈钢
不锈钢焊条；不锈纲电焊支
不锈钢制品（stainless steel product的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 不锈的，不会脏的，无污点的，未被玷污的
trans.tran_en: resistant to discoloration, esp discoloration resulting from corrosion; rust-resistant
